017package org.microbean.qualifier;
018
019import java.util.Map;
020
021import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
023
024import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Map;
025import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Object;
026import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_String;
027
028import static java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.STATIC;
029
030import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Qualifier;
031
032/**
033 * A {@link Binding} used to qualify objects.
034 *
035 * <p>This is a <a
036 * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/doc-files/ValueBased.html">value-based</a>
037 * class.</p>
038 *
039 * @param <K> the type of a {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
040 * #attributes() attribute keys}
041 *
042 * @param <V> the type of a {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain #value()
043 * value} and of its {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values}
044 *
045 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
046 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
047 *
048 * @see Binding
049 */
050public final class Qualifier<K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> extends Binding<K, V, Qualifier<K, V>> {
051
052  private Qualifier(final String name,
053                    final V value,
054                    final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> attributes,
055                    final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> info) {
056    super(name, value, attributes, info);
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Returns a {@link MethodHandleDesc} describing the constructor or
061   * {@code static} method that will be used to create a <a
062   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
063   * constant</a> representing this {@link Qualifier}.
064   *
065   * <p>End users have no need to call this method.</p>
066   *
067   * @return a {@link MethodHandleDesc} describing the constructor or
068   * {@code static} method that will be used to create a <a
069   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
070   * constant</a> representing this {@link Qualifier}
071   *
072   * @nullability This method does not return {@code null}.
073   *
074   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
075   *
076   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
077   * threads.
078   */
079  @Override // Binding<K, V, Qualifier<K, V>>
080  protected final MethodHandleDesc describeConstructor() {
081    return
082      MethodHandleDesc.ofMethod(STATIC,
083                                CD_Qualifier,
084                                "of",
085                                MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_Qualifier, CD_String, CD_Object, CD_Map, CD_Map));
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * Returns a {@link Qualifier}, which may or may not be newly
090   * created, representing the supplied arguments.
091   *
092   * @param <K> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
093   * #attributes() attribute keys}
094   *
095   * @param <V> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain #value()
096   * value} and of its {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values}
097   *
098   * @param name the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain Qualifier#name()
099   * name}; must not be {@code null}
100   *
101   * @return a {@link Qualifier}
102   *
103   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
104   *
105   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
106   *
107   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
108   * threads.
109   */
110  public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> Qualifier<K, V> of(final String name) {
111    return of(name, null, null, null);
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * Returns a {@link Qualifier}, which may or may not be newly
116   * created, representing the supplied arguments.
117   *
118   * @param <K> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
119   * #attributes() attribute keys}
120   *
121   * @param <V> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain #value()
122   * value} and of its {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values}
123   *
124   * @param name the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain Qualifier#name()
125   * name}; must not be {@code null}
126   *
127   * @param value the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
128   * Qualifier#value() value}; may be {@code null}
129   *
130   * @return a {@link Qualifier}
131   *
132   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
133   *
134   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
135   *
136   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
137   * threads.
138   */
139  public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> Qualifier<K, V> of(final String name, final V value) {
140    return of(name, value, null, null);
141  }
142
143  /**
144   * Returns a {@link Qualifier}, which may or may not be newly
145   * created, representing the supplied arguments.
146   *
147   * @param <K> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
148   * #attributes() attribute keys}
149   *
150   * @param <V> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain #value()
151   * value} and of its {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values}
152   *
153   * @param name the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain Qualifier#name()
154   * name}; must not be {@code null}
155   *
156   * @param value the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
157   * Qualifier#value() value}; may be {@code null}
158   *
159   * @param attributes the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
160   * Qualifier#attributes() attributes}; may be {@code null}
161   *
162   * @return a {@link Qualifier}
163   *
164   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
165   *
166   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
167   *
168   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
169   * threads.
170   */
171  public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> Qualifier<K, V> of(final String name,
172                                                                              final V value,
173                                                                              final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> attributes) {
174    return of(name, value, attributes, null);
175  }
176
177  /**
178   * Returns a {@link Qualifier}, which may or may not be newly
179   * created, representing the supplied arguments.
180   *
181   * @param <K> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
182   * #attributes() attribute keys}
183   *
184   * @param <V> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain #value()
185   * value} and of its {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values}
186   *
187   * @param name the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain Qualifier#name()
188   * name}; must not be {@code null}
189   *
190   * @param value the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
191   * Qualifier#value() value}; may be {@code null}
192   *
193   * @param attributes the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
194   * Qualifier#attributes() attributes}; may be {@code null}
195   *
196   * @param info the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain Qualifier#info()
197   * informational attributes}; may be {@code null}
198   *
199   * @return a {@link Qualifier}
200   *
201   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
202   *
203   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
204   *
205   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
206   * threads.
207   */
208  public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> Qualifier<K, V> of(final String name,
209                                                                              final V value,
210                                                                              final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> attributes,
211                                                                              final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> info) {
212    return new Qualifier<>(name, value, attributes, info);
213  }
214
215}
